short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows some of the features of the Context Menus API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Voiper lets people call you from the browser. It also gives you the ability of not sharing your phone number and yet receive calls.

How?

Pair it with the Voiper iPhone App by entering your phone number. 
Then select any text and click on create phone (make sure you have extension access enabled - on the app).
This will create a phone and have a link copied over to your clipboard. Simple.

Use this link in you emails, ads etc. Anyone who visits the link, will be able to call you by simply clicking on it!

Get the Voiper App at

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/voiper/id947211493
